segments.text: Hello , this is Dunlin . May I speak to Mrs Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Mrs Smith . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to say thank you for the interview yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . I am very impressed by your capability .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything I should do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , nothing . It's thoughtful of you to call me again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Please call me at any time if you have any questions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will . Do you have any question ?
segments.speaker: S2
